---
title: "Decision Tree/ Gini index"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
install.packages("rpart.plot")

library(rpart)
library(rpart.plot)

data <- data.frame(
  label = c(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  x1 = c(12, 8, 13, 2, 9, 10),
  x2 = c(15, 4, 7, 6, 10, 9))

fit <- rpart(label ~ x1 + x2, data, control = rpart.control(minsplit = 2))
rpart.plot(fit)


```
